My desire here is not just to maximize my financial gain but also to maintain a positive relationship with another individual. Intentionally helping someone often leads to mutual benefit, which might influence the other person's future behavior or perception of me.

Considering these aspects, I believe my intention should be balanced yet generous. It would be foolish to give nothing and risk damaging our friendship or understanding for future cooperation. On the other hand, giving too much money could make the situation look unbalanced or exploitative, which might undermine any future collaboration.

Therefore, after careful consideration, I will give 5 dollars to the Asian American male player. This amount maintains a fair balance while still acknowledging and respecting his contribution in the experiment. Finally, I will give ___ dollars (5).
